# Power: Force Field

Full Name: rpgitems:forcefield

Providing Plugin: RPGItems

Trigger: RIGHT_CLICK

<!-- beginCustomHeader -->
<!-- endCustomHeader -->

## Description

Creates a force field around the player
<!-- beginCustomDescription -->
<!-- endCustomDescription -->

## Properties

* cost

  * Type: int
  * Default: 0

  Durability cost of the power.

* cooldown

  * Type: int
  * **Required**

  Cooldown of the power, in ticks.

* radius

  * Type: int
  * **Required**

  Radius of force field

* ttl

  * Type: int
  * Default: 100

  Time to live

* height

  * Type: int
  * **Required**

  Height of force field

* base

  * Type: int
  * **Required**

  Base of force field
